      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b7788a14-17b8-495b-bf89-ac834b62fd23#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Nagyüzemi állattartás</string>
            <string language="en">Large-scale Animal-keeping</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Großräumiges Tier-Halten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animal-garder de grande puissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animal-manter-se Em grande escala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animale-mantenere Su grande scala</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεγάλης κλίμακας ζωικός-κράτηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Animal-guardar En grande</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Nagyüzemi állattartás bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction of large-scale animal-keeping</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fejlődés,  szarvasmarha,  tej,  hús,  állattartás,  nagyüzem,  termelőszövetkezet,  </string>
            <string language="en">development, horned cattle,  milk,  meat, animal keeping, large scale, famers' co-operative,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung des großräumigen Tier-Haltens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction d'animal-garder de grande puissance</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução de animal-manter-se em grande 
escala</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione di animale-mantenere su grande scala</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή της μεγάλης κλίμακας ζωικός-κράτησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción de animal-guardar en grande</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung, gehörntes Vieh, Milch, Fleisch, 
Tierhalten, große Skala, Kooperative der famers',</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">développement, bétail à cornes, lait, viande, garder
animal, grande échelle, le co-operative des famers,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desenvolvimento, gado horned, leite, carne, manter-se 
animal, escala grande, cooperativa dos famers',</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo, bestiami cornuti, latte, carne, mantenere 
animale, grande scala, cooperativa dei famers,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάπτυξη, κερασφόρα βοοειδή, γάλα, κρέας, ζώο που κρατά, 
μεγάλη κλίμακα, συνεταιρισμός των famers,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">desarrollo, ganados de cuernos, leche, carne, el guardar
animal, escala grande, cooperativa de los famers,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
